snippet: Airport hotels have expanded their services far beyond the standard room for the stranded traveler.
abstract: Airport hotels have come a long way from their reputation as lonely places with bare essentials, used mostly by stranded travelers; most have expanded their services, creating relaxing retreats close to or even in the middle of airports.
lead_paragraph: Airport hotels have expanded their services far beyond the standard room for the stranded traveler.
